description:
The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freedom Taken Away! The Nobles` Plot Closing In on the Brothers!
Ubawareta Jiyuu! Sankyoudai ni Semaru Kizoku no Wana
Une liberté volée ! Le piège de la noblesse se resserre autour des trois frères
Украденная свобода! Братья в ловушке Дворян!
奪われた自由! 三兄弟に迫る貴族の罠
